custom-sql.sql: ( SELECT app.* from ScienceApp_ScienceApp AS app where (app.title LIKE ?) OR (app.name LIKE ?) ) UNION ( SELECT app.* FROM ( SELECT man.* FROM ( SELECT user.* FROM User_ AS user WHERE user.screenName = ? ) AS user JOIN ScienceApp_ScienceAppManager AS man ON user.userId = man.managerId ) AS sm JOIN ScienceApp_ScienceApp AS app ON sm.scienceAppId = app.scienceAppId ) UNION ( SELECT app.* FROM ( SELECT aff.* FROM SciencePlatformHook_SpAffiliation AS aff WHERE aff.spAffiliationName LIKE ? ) AS affid JOIN SciencePlatformHook_SpUser AS spUser ON spUser.spAffiliationId = affid.spAffiliationId JOIN ScienceApp_ScienceApp AS app ON (app.userId = spUser.spUserId OR app.authorId = spUser.spUserId) )

( SELECT app.* from ScienceApp_ScienceApp AS app where ((app.title LIKE ?) OR (app.name LIKE ?)) AND app.stage = ? ) UNION ( SELECT app.* FROM ( SELECT man.* FROM ( SELECT user.* FROM User_ AS user WHERE user.screenName = ? ) AS user JOIN ScienceApp_ScienceAppManager AS man ON user.userId = man.managerId ) AS sm JOIN ScienceApp_ScienceApp AS app ON sm.scienceAppId = app.scienceAppId WHERE app.stage = ? ) UNION ( SELECT app.* FROM ( SELECT aff.* FROM SciencePlatformHook_SpAffiliation AS aff WHERE aff.spAffiliationName LIKE ? ) AS affid JOIN SciencePlatformHook_SpUser AS spUser ON spUser.spAffiliationId = affid.spAffiliationId JOIN ScienceApp_ScienceApp AS app ON (app.userId = spUser.spUserId OR app.authorId = spUser.spUserId) WHERE app.stage = ? )

( SELECT app.* from ScienceApp_ScienceApp AS app where ((app.title LIKE ?) OR (app.name LIKE ?)) AND app.stage = ? AND app.targetLanguage = ? ) UNION ( SELECT app.* FROM ( SELECT man.* FROM ( SELECT user.* FROM User_ AS user WHERE user.screenName = ? ) AS user JOIN ScienceApp_ScienceAppManager AS man ON user.userId = man.managerId ) AS sm JOIN ScienceApp_ScienceApp AS app ON sm.scienceAppId = app.scienceAppId WHERE app.targetLanguage = ? ) UNION ( SELECT app.* FROM ( SELECT aff.* FROM SciencePlatformHook_SpAffiliation AS aff WHERE aff.spAffiliationName LIKE ? ) AS affid JOIN SciencePlatformHook_SpUser AS spUser ON spUser.spAffiliationId = affid.spAffiliationId JOIN ScienceApp_ScienceApp AS app ON (app.userId = spUser.spUserId OR app.authorId = spUser.spUserId) WHERE app.targetLanguage = ? )

( SELECT app.* from ScienceApp_ScienceApp AS app where ((app.title LIKE ?) OR (app.name LIKE ?)) AND app.stage = ? AND app.targetLanguage = ? ) UNION ( SELECT app.* FROM ( SELECT man.* FROM ( SELECT user.* FROM User_ AS user WHERE user.screenName = ? ) AS user JOIN ScienceApp_ScienceAppManager AS man ON user.userId = man.managerId ) AS sm JOIN ScienceApp_ScienceApp AS app ON sm.scienceAppId = app.scienceAppId WHERE app.stage = ? AND app.targetLanguage = ? ) UNION ( SELECT app.* FROM ( SELECT aff.* FROM SciencePlatformHook_SpAffiliation AS aff WHERE aff.spAffiliationName LIKE ? ) AS affid JOIN SciencePlatformHook_SpUser AS spUser ON spUser.spAffiliationId = affid.spAffiliationId JOIN ScienceApp_ScienceApp AS app ON (app.userId = spUser.spUserId OR app.authorId = spUser.spUserId) WHERE app.stage = ? AND app.targetLanguage = ? )

SELECT app.* FROM ( SELECT man.* FROM ( SELECT user.* FROM User_ AS user WHERE user.screenName = ? ) AS user JOIN ScienceApp_ScienceAppManager AS man ON user.userId = man.managerId ) AS sm JOIN ON sm.scienceAppId = app.scienceAppId

SELECT app.* FROM ( SELECT man.* FROM ( SELECT user.* FROM User_ AS user WHERE user.screenName = ? ) AS user JOIN ScienceApp_ScienceAppManager AS man ON user.userId = man.managerId ) AS sm JOIN ScienceApp_ScienceApp AS app ON sm.scienceAppId = app.scienceAppId WHERE app.stage = ?

SELECT app.* FROM ( SELECT man.* FROM ( SELECT user.* FROM User_ AS user WHERE user.screenName = ? ) AS user JOIN ScienceApp_ScienceAppManager AS man ON user.userId = man.managerId ) AS sm JOIN ScienceApp_ScienceApp AS app ON sm.scienceAppId = app.scienceAppId WHERE app.targetLanguage = ?

SELECT app.* FROM ( SELECT man.* FROM ( SELECT user.* FROM User_ AS user WHERE user.screenName = ? ) AS user JOIN ScienceApp_ScienceAppManager AS man ON user.userId = man.managerId ) AS sm JOIN ScienceApp_ScienceApp AS app ON sm.scienceAppId = app.scienceAppId WHERE app.stage = ? AND app.targetLanguage = ?

SELECT app.* FROM ( SELECT aff.* FROM SciencePlatformHook_SpAffiliation AS aff WHERE aff.spAffiliationName LIKE ? ) AS affid JOIN SciencePlatformHook_SpUser AS spUser ON spUser.spAffiliationId = affid.spAffiliationId JOIN ScienceApp_ScienceApp AS app ON (app.userId = spUser.spUserId OR app.authorId = spUser.spUserId)

SELECT app.* FROM ( SELECT aff.* FROM SciencePlatformHook_SpAffiliation AS aff WHERE aff.spAffiliationName LIKE ? ) AS affid JOIN SciencePlatformHook_SpUser AS spUser ON spUser.spAffiliationId = affid.spAffiliationId JOIN ScienceApp_ScienceApp AS app ON (app.userId = spUser.spUserId OR app.authorId = spUser.spUserId) WHERE app.stage = ?

SELECT app.* FROM ( SELECT aff.* FROM SciencePlatformHook_SpAffiliation AS aff WHERE aff.spAffiliationName LIKE ? ) AS affid JOIN SciencePlatformHook_SpUser AS spUser ON spUser.spAffiliationId = affid.spAffiliationId JOIN ScienceApp_ScienceApp AS app ON (app.userId = spUser.spUserId OR app.authorId = spUser.spUserId) WHERE app.targetLanguage = ?

SELECT app.* FROM ( SELECT aff.* FROM SciencePlatformHook_SpAffiliation AS aff WHERE aff.spAffiliationName LIKE ? ) AS affid JOIN SciencePlatformHook_SpUser AS spUser ON spUser.spAffiliationId = affid.spAffiliationId JOIN ScienceApp_ScienceApp AS app ON (app.userId = spUser.spUserId OR app.authorId = spUser.spUserId) WHERE app.stage = ? AND app.targetLanguage = ?

SELECT app.* FROM ( SELECT link.scienceAppId FROM ( SELECT category.* FROM AssetCategory AS category WHERE category.vocabularyId = ? ) AS catId JOIN scienceapp_scienceappcategorylink AS link ON catId.categoryId = link.categoryId ) AS slink JOIN scienceapp_scienceapp AS app ON slink.scienceAppId = app.scienceAppId

SELECT app.* FROM ( SELECT link.scienceAppId FROM ( SELECT category.* FROM AssetCategory AS category WHERE category.vocabularyId = ? ) AS catId JOIN scienceapp_scienceappcategorylink AS link ON catId.categoryId = link.categoryId ) AS slink JOIN scienceapp_scienceapp AS app ON slink.scienceAppId = app.scienceAppId WHERE app.stage = ?

AND app.targetLanguage = ?

SELECT app.* FROM ( SELECT link.scienceAppId FROM ( ( SELECT rc.* FROM AssetCategory AS rc WHERE rc.categoryId = ? ) UNION ( SELECT cc.* FROM AssetCategory as cc WHERE cc.parentCategoryId = ? ) ) AS catId JOIN scienceapp_scienceappcategorylink AS link ON catId.categoryId = link.categoryId ) AS slink JOIN scienceapp_scienceapp AS app ON slink.scienceAppId = app.scienceAppId

SELECT app.* FROM ( SELECT link.scienceAppId FROM( ( SELECT rc.* FROM AssetCategory AS rc WHERE rc.categoryId = ? ) UNION ( SELECT cc.* FROM AssetCategory as cc WHERE cc.parentCategoryId = ? ) ) AS catId JOIN scienceapp_scienceappcategorylink AS link ON catId.categoryId = link.categoryId ) AS slink JOIN scienceapp_scienceapp AS app ON slink.scienceAppId = app.scienceAppId WHERE app.targetLanguage = ?

SELECT app.* FROM( SELECT link.scienceAppId FROM( ( SELECT rc.* FROM AssetCategory AS rc WHERE rc.categoryId = ? ) UNION ( SELECT cc.* FROM AssetCategory as cc WHERE cc.parentCategoryId = ? ) ) AS catId JOIN scienceapp_scienceappcategorylink AS link ON catId.categoryId = link.categoryId ) AS slink JOIN scienceapp_scienceapp AS app ON slink.scienceAppId = app.scienceAppId WHERE app.stage = ?
